reviewText: Might as well watch a movie, it's simply a show, lack or no details in the techniques. This is not the type of instructions I expected. Absolutely Not worth $28. "I wish I could return it and get a refund" . I have been in martial arts for over twenty years, and wanted to expend some of the knowledge in my dojo. I will have to keep on looking. I known Krav Maga works  but this  DVD will not help you. Very disappointed !!!
